an8.10:2.5: tena paraputtena visodhitena → kiṃ vo paraputto viheṭhiyati (bj) | kiṃ paraputto viheṭheti (s1-3) | kiṃ vo paraputtā viheṭheti (pts1) | kiṃ so paraputto visodheti (mr)
an8.10:2.9: samaṇadūsīvāyaṃ → samaṇarūpī cāyaṃ (mr), samaṇakāraṇḍavo’ti → samaṇakaraṇḍavoti (s1-3, mr)
an8.10:5.1: phuṇamānassa → pūyamānassa (bj) | vuyhamānassa (si) | phusayamānassa (s1-3) | vuvahyamānassa (pts1) | punamānassa (?), apavahati → apakassati (bj)
